entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.6°C

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
